title: menu role
description: A type of widget that offers a list of choices to the user.

assertions.title: convey an appropriate role
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware that elements are within a menu
examples: The role may be implied by the presence of menuitem children

assertions.title: convey the name if named
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware of the name of menu
examples: The accessible name of the menu is announced when entering the menu.

assertions.title: convey the boundaries of the menu
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware when they enter and exit a menu
examples: Boundaries may be implied by posinset information
